channel.title: Changing names of items NPC's
channel.description:
I've run into a bit of a problem.
I've changed the names of a few NPC's and items in the .cfg files, but what must I do in the NPC handler, because after I compiled my server it comes up with exception java.lang, NPChandler etc..
I also have changed max stats to 200 and my characters skill exp to 1400000000 I can't log in anymore, it logs my into the "loadingplease wait" screen then gets "connection lost" and keeps connecting/disconnection
What do you guys rekon I could do. Man coding is so hard.
Also if you guys could code me up a pre-made server to save me heaps of time as I've been trying to get my server going for 5 days now and no luck lol.
I'll give you full credit for it and make you co-owner. Thanks heaps if you can help me on either of these problems :)
Hmpph

item.title: Changing names of items NPC's
item.dc:creator: @_Worx `Worx
item.description:
@_Worx wrote:

instinctions:

yes, it is very possible to make stat’s 200 but do not go any higher or else it’ll null out your server

You need to go stfu and hang yourself. Stop bumping this shit, idiot.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing names of items NPC's
item.dc:creator: @mLexus mLexus
item.description:
@mLexus wrote:

You need to edit the fucking client.java to increase the level count.

And it IS possible to increase it dumbass.

Read full topic

item.description:
@lool121 wrote:

max stat to 200… thats highly impossible… i got max of 135 with 486000000 xp
